tooltip: Select Talik the Red as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Talik focuses on improving the damage of her forces.
Allows you to summon Talik, a large and strong spear wielding hero.
Armored Lizalfos unit wielding a flaming sword that can ignite buildings with its attack.
Can demolish deity statues in order to pick others. The cost to build or replace statues increases with each demolishing.
All non-creature, non-mechanical Lizalfos units deal minor damage to enemies when killed.
